org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol

Class HdfsFileStatus

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.protocol.HdfsFileStatus
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    HdfsLocatedFileStatus

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Evolving
public class HdfsFileStatus
extends Object
    Interface that represents the over the wire information for a file.

    • Constructor Detail

      • HdfsFileStatus

        public HdfsFileStatus(long length,
              boolean isdir,
              int block_replication,
              long blocksize,
              long modification_time,
              long access_time,
              org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission.FsPermission permission,
              String owner,
              String group,
              byte[] symlink,
              byte[] path,
              long fileId,
              int childrenNum,
              org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileEncryptionInfo feInfo,
              byte storagePolicy)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        length - the number of bytes the file has
        isdir - if the path is a directory
        block_replication - the replication factor
        blocksize - the block size
        modification_time - modification time
        access_time - access time
        permission - permission
        owner - the owner of the path
        group - the group of the path
        path - the local name in java UTF8 encoding the same as that in-memory
        fileId - the file id
        feInfo - the file's encryption info
